title: Google links massive cloud outage to API management issue
summary: Google says an API management issue is behind Thursday's massive Google Cloud outage, which disrupted or brought down its services and many other online platforms. [...]

title: Discord flaw lets hackers reuse expired invites in malware campaign
summary: Hackers are hijacking expired or deleted Discord invite links to redirect users to malicious sites that deliver remote access trojans and information-stealing malware. [...]
